meanings.definition: A sudden outburst of emotion or action
meanings.sent1: Her fits of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The child's tantrum was a fit of anger.
meanings.sent3: During the comedy show, his fits of giggles were contagious.
meanings.sent4: The sudden fit of rage surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: His fit of excitement was palpable as he opened the gift.

meanings.definition: To be of the right size or shape for something
meanings.sent1: The key fits perfectly into the lock.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle piece fits snugly in its place.
meanings.sent3: The new sofa fits nicely in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The missing piece finally fits into the puzzle of my life.
meanings.sent5: The shoe fits comfortably on my foot.

meanings.sent1: He experienced a fit during the night and was taken to the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The sudden fit caused concern among his friends.
meanings.sent3: The fit startled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The fit passed quickly, leaving him exhausted.
meanings.sent5: The fit subsided as quickly as it had come.

meanings.definition: To match or be suitable for something
meanings.sent1: The color of the curtains fits well with the room decor.
meanings.sent2: His skills fit the requirements of the job perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The new employee fits in seamlessly with the team.
meanings.sent4: The missing piece finally fits into the puzzle of my life.
meanings.sent5: The key fits into the keyhole effortlessly.
